title: Client keeps rolling back to v1.3
body:
Not sure why, I have redownloaded the client and it changed back to the normal login screen. If i restart or log out and back in it reverts back to the v1.3 login screen. 

edit - if i login on the v1.3 client it doesn't need to update it just looks like the normal client.

https://imgur.com/rRpnbtb

replies.body: As far as I'm aware it's being rolled out bit by bit to make sure everything is stable. It should function as normal, and shouldn't be any different beyond that initial loading screen for now.
